body: Hello, as you have noticed I was recently promoted to Senior Moderator, so to celebrate, I decided that I'd do an AMA. Ask away!

replies.body:
Congratulations again Pelp, here's my list of questions I've been storing up, I fancy commenting on them as well, haha! :P


  1. How do you start a conversation? For me, I smile.
  2. Have you ever been stung by a bee? To be honest, I'm pretty sure, we all have. Don't comment on that. ._.
  3. Are you wearing socks? Umm, yea... 
  4. List someone you know, and describe them in 5 words. This is rather interesting sometimes.
  5. Would you rather go a week without bathing, but be able to change your clothes? Or a week without changing your clothes, but be able to bath? That means washing in general, (showering etc.). I'd chose the latter, because of my hair.
  6. Name the most terrifying moment of your life so far. Have you recovered from it? Playing "Five Nights at Freddy's" and being freaked out of my skin. Such scare, no fun. 
  7. What is the longest you have gone without sleep? 24 hours, back-to-back sleepovers, more like stay-up-all-night-overs. Heh.
  8. You are walking home in the dark, you see something move. Who/What is it (guess)?. What do you do? I hate the dark, don't even get me started thinking about that. >.<
  9. What question do you hate to answer? <--------
  10. What cheers you up? Thumping music. Sorry neighbours! c:
Very well done again Pel with your new position. ;)

replies.body:
1. How do you start a conversation? I usually talk about whatever pops into my head
  2. Have you ever been stung by a bee? Yes, I have :)
  3. Are you wearing socks? No
  4. List someone you know, and describe them in 5 words. Ambi - Changed, Buddy, Makes my day, Bully, Likes football
  5. Would you rather go a week without bathing, but be able to change your clothes? Or a week without changing your clothes, but be able to bath? 2nd one.d
  6. Name the most terrifying moment of your life so far. Have you recovered from it? Experiencing an avalanche, not really :P
  7. What is the longest you have gone without sleep? 24 hours, all nighters for the win.
  8. You are walking home in the dark, you see something move. Who/What is it (guess)?. What do you do? Think it's really dramatic and run for my life.
  9. What question do you hate to answer? Can you talk dutch for us?
  10. What cheers you up? Music.

replies.body: What was your reaction when you were asked to be Sr. Mod?
replies.body_tagged: What was your reaction when you were asked to be Sr. Mod?

replies.body: It works different here :P. You take an interview, along with the other Mods that would like to try. Then, after all interviews are reviewed, you get told whether you made it or not. I was happy, really happy. I was relieved as well, just to get told you made, it's great.
replies.body_tagged: It works different here :P. You take an interview, along with the other Mods that would like to try. Then, after all interviews are reviewed, you get told whether you made it or not. I was happy, really happy. I was relieved as well, just to get told you made, it's great.
